Grudge Match Recap
Monster Rancher Metropolis: The Coliseum (Public Monster Rancher Tournaments): Archived Topics From Prior Years: Miscellaneous Messages: Grudge Match Recap
By Deadbuffalo on Tuesday, February 25, 2003 - 07:04 am:

Last night two unofficial grudge matches were held between me and the decorous Torey Luvullo in the chatroom.

These grudges were between Lisaione and Patsy, and Pokylyps and Sofia. Both of those fights, I felt I had the better monster, but lost nonetheless. While Pokylyps did go on to win his bracket, that was not the case with Lisaione, so I felt a rematch was in order.

Forgive me for any mistakes, as this is an unofficial match, its all from memory.

Lordly Lisaione vs. Fatsy Patsy

Round 1 had Lisaione getting her revenge with a strong tsunami and a submerge to win her the match. Round 2 Patsy managed to win with a tsunami of her own and a few well placed tail whips. Round 3 Patsy kept Lisaione's guts down with constant Lesihorne attacks, and a tail whip for the win. Round 4 had Patsy score an early tail whip hit, but was followed up by lots of Lesihornes, some that hit and some that missed. Lisaione got a tail whip in, but screwed up her chances of winning with a blocked tsunami with 10 seconds on the clock.

Patsy won, and is now the better lesione to me. 3-1

Pokylyps the Proud vs. Sofia the Suezo

Slap and a Tornado Punch were all it took to win Pokylyps Round 1. But round 2 featured a 467 critical noise from the suezo, a well placed suezo beam, and licking action to show why the Suezo had won in their first meeting. I don't quite remember round 3, but I think it ended with an overkill olega meteor at the last few seconds, leaving the suezo smeared all over a crater. Round 4 Sofia took easily without suffering a scratch thanks to her great withering techniques and 'cause that girl can dance (pokylyps missed a lot). Round 5 started off with an Olega Meteor or a Tornado Punch, I forget, but it was something unpleasant for Sofia. And to end the night, Pokylyps finished with a 767 damage critical Tornado Punch, effectively ending Sofia's career as a monster.

Pokylyps won 3-2

Justice has been served

By torey luvullo on Tuesday, February 25, 2003 - 02:36 pm:

i thought poky took it 3-1. whatever - sofia is a born loser, and she surely did get lucky to beat poky the one time. patsy has turned out to be a useful lesi, and i am glad she repeated.
